name: Scrapped
description: Scrapped is an exciting 3D side-scrolling action platformer that is both cute and fun for gamers of all ages. You control Dr. Dxter, a robot scientist that crash-landed on a dangerous planet after a vicious pirate attack, and he will need his cool gadgets and tools to to survive the onslaught of adorable space pirates coming for the bounty placed on Dr. Dxter’s head, explore and find a way to repair his ship so he can make his daring getaway.
